article_title: Can US pressure deliver Israel-Hamas truce in Gaza?
sentence: But  Hamas  has  reportedly  told  negotiators  it  is  not  holding  40  people  in  this  category,  raising  the  prospect  that  many  more  hostages  than  previously  thought  have  died  or  that  they  could  be  in  the  hands  of  other  armed  groups,  such  as  Palestinian  Islamic  Jihad.

article_title: Can US pressure deliver Israel-Hamas truce in Gaza?
sentence: The  war  in  Gaza,  Israel's  response  to  the  Hamas  attacks  on  7  October  that  killed  about  1,200  people,  has  killed  more  than  33,000  Palestinians,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry,  destroyed  large  parts  of  the  territory,  and  left  many  on  the  brink  of  famine.
